parameters.description: Linking Strategy based on IDs clustering and specifying required datasets.
parameters.query:
prefix skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
 prefix attx: <http://data.hulib.helsinki.fi/attx/>
 construct { ?r1 skos:exactMatch ?r2} where { ?r1 attx:id ?id .
  ?r2 attx:id ?id .
  filter(?r1 != ?r2)
}
parameters.title: IDs based Linking Strategy
